
{{alias}}( str )
    Tests if a `string` starts with the characters of another `string`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    search: string
        Search string.

    position: integer
        Position at which to start searching for `search`.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether a `string` starts with the characters of
        another `string`.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( 'Beep', 'Be' )
    true
    > out = {{alias}}( 'Beep', 'ep' )
    false
    > out = {{alias}}( 'Beep', 'ee', 1 )
    true

    See Also
    --------
